resources.string: DaysApp
Life comes in seasons
Tough times don\'t last. Tough people do.(Robert H.Schuller)
Think of the tortoise and the hare
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.(Confucius)
Take the plunge
Everything you\'ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.(George Addair)
Be honest with yourself
Pain is temporary. Quitting last forever.(Lance Armstrong)
Difficulties are chances
A problem is a chance for you to do your best.(Duke Ellington)
Test your Superpowers
Hard times don\'t create heroes. it is during the hard times when the \'hero\' within us is revealed.(Bob Riley)
Perfect doesn\'t matter
It\'s not about perfect. it\'s about effort.(Jillian Michaels)
You can
Believe you can and you\'re halfway there.(Theodore Roosevelt)
Good comes from Adversity
Difficult roads always lead to beautiful destinations.(Zig Ziglar)
Forget Comparison
Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.(Steve Jobs)
Keep trying
Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.(Julie Andrews)
Keep dreams alive
Goals may give focus, but dreams give power. (John Maxwell)
be your wonderful self
You cannot fail at being yourself. (Wayne Dyer)
We\'re not all world-changers
If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way. (Napoleon Hill)
Be intentional
When you know what you want, and want it bad enough, you’ll find a way to get it. (Jim Rohn)
Your Intentional Life
I’d rather regret the things I’ve done than regret the things I haven’t done. (Lucille Ball)
Routines and habits
“Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.” (Jim Rohn)
Perfectionism is an enemy
“Done is better than perfect.” (Sheryl Sandberg)
Hang in there
I did not get there by wishing for it or hoping for it, but by working for it. (Estée Lauder)
Dreams are just plans that need targets
Don’t ask if your dream is crazy, ask if it’s crazy enough. (Lena Waithe)
Success will never land in your lap
Success is what happens after you have survived all of your disappointments. (Unknown)
Be brave
Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star. (W. Clement Stone)
Try new things
Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new. (Brian Tracy)
outcomes will always be unexpected
Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out. (John Wooden)
Make a plan
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can. (Arthur Ashe)
Grit
Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did. (Newt Gingrich)
Learn from defeat
We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated. (Maya Angelou)
Rethink your approach to problems
Expect problems and eat them for breakfast. (Alfred A. Montapert)
Don\'t do Easy
Strength doesn’t come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn’t. (Rikki Rogers)
Exercise your Courage
We don’t develop courage by being happy every day. We develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity. (Barbara De Angelis)
